dict.string: Relay's macMCP tools need access to Contacts to read and search your address book.
Relay's macMCP tools need access to Calendars to read and manage events and reminders.
Relay's macMCP tools need your location for weather and mapping features.
Relay's macMCP tools need microphone access for audio capture.
Relay's macMCP tools need to send Apple Events to automate other applications.
Relay's macMCP tools need access to Reminders to read and manage your reminders.
